korean_sentence: 그는 10년 동안 요리 기술을 _____ 전문 셰프가 되었다.
english_translation: He mastered cooking skills for 10 years and became a professional chef.

korean_sentence: 여행 중에 호텔에서 일주일 동안 _____ 있어요.
english_translation: I'm staying at a hotel for a week during my trip.
The broken car was repaired at the garage.
The painter completed his masterpiece after 3 years.
She obtained her driver's license yesterday.
This business trip expenses exceeded the company budget.
All parents earnestly wish for their children's happiness.
A major traffic accident occurred on the highway yesterday.
I can't climb the stairs alone because I injured my leg.
Each person has a different personality and way of thinking.
